name: Sneaky Knight
description:
Sneaky Knight is a turn-based adventure game. Our friendly knight sneak into an adventure in a solitary forrest. He try to convince all the fellow bandits through the path in order to defeat the mighty rock goblin.

Controls :

A for left and D for right

In order to attack, wait for your turn, chose your char which you want to attack with then chose the enemy and press the Attack button.
